entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
